price: Àti pé (Èṣù) kúkú ti ṣi ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ ẹ̀dá lọ́nà nínú yín. Ṣé ẹ kò níí ṣe làákàyè ni?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
